personal_projects.name: ISecure
personal_projects.description: A distress call emergency app that responds to recorded voice commands, If triggered, it will send a distress call to the nearest police station and it will lock the phone for an hour. Location will be constantly updated and be sent to the authorized personnel.

personal_projects.name: Vulcanice
personal_projects.description: A station tracker app that searches and tracks nearest vulcanizing stations or nearest gas stations available. Comes along with reservation for vulcanizing stations. There are two user types, Client and Shop Owner. Shop Owners can register their own shops and be accepted by the admin.

personal_projects.name: Portfolio
personal_projects.description: My very own portfolio, Comes with all my different hobbies which are: Cooking, Music, Sports and Coding. Cooking comes with all my recipes, Music comes with all my recordings and a music player, Sports comes with my favorite teams and blog posts, and finally Coding comes with rating of my own skill and projects made.

personal_projects.description: Comes with uploading my recordings, adding or updating of recipes, and adding of blog posts, and updating my skills and projects
